%project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% 2020- 9-f-culp disencumbrance 2020-9-f-culp disencumbrance w/corrected pre-encumbrance number. fiscal officer the individual responsible for managing financial transactions delegates individuals assigned by the fiscal officer to approve documents on their behalf reviewer supervisor an optional user or work group in addition to the fiscal officer that a department wants to approve a document identifies another user who is interested in the account they will receive fyi only

2020- 9-f-culp disencumbrance 2020-9-f-culp disencumbrance w/corrected pre-encumbrance number. 1 2 3 4 level 1 involves the fiscal officer: standard for most documents level 2 or organization review is optional level 3 or special conditions depends on the document and transaction type level 4 is the routing to the account supervisor or reviewer %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides%
2020- 9-f-culp disencumbrance 2020-9-f-culp disencumbrance w/corrected pre-encumbrance number. 5307521422 %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% checking system for accuracy

1- always use the interface buttons when navigating in the application. avoid using the browser back button. %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides%

2020- 9-f-culp disencumbrance 2020-9-f-culp disencumbrance w/corrected pre-encumbrance number. copy: creates a new editable version of the document %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% 2- use the lookup screens to find your data and edit/copy functionality
3- format dates day/month/year use the date selector whenever possible to enter dates %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides%
